name: Modernbanc
headline: Accounting software that works for you
description: Simple to set-up, flexible and powerful platform to manage your business finances

founders.name: Gregory Gevorkyan, Founder
founders.description: Building Modernbanc (W20) - the best way to manage your business finances.

generated_description:
**Modernbanc: Account Management Reinvented**

Founded in 2020 and nestled in the heart of San Francisco, Modernbanc is shaking up the accounting software world. As a proud member of Y Combinator's Batch W20, this fintech startup is on a mission to redefine how businesses manage their finances. It’s all about simplicity and power—think of it as accounting software that really works for you.

### What Does Modernbanc Do?

The core offering is a straightforward but powerful platform designed to make financial management effortless for businesses big and small. Modernbanc lets you:

- **Track Everything**: Manage all your bank accounts from one dashboard.
- **Automate Your Process**: Set rules for automatic transaction categorization.
- **Gain Insights**: Build custom reports using live data or leverage their handy templates.
- **Utilize AI**: Get smart suggestions to optimize your business operations.

With Modernbanc entering public beta, you can now explore its features with a free trial. Curated for performance, the platform operates smoothly, even without an internet connection. From budgeting and forecasting to detailed reporting, it's really all in one place.

### Who's Behind the Scenes?

Modernbanc operates with a tight-knit team of six people, including Dalton Caldwell as a Group Partner. The company embodies a strong culture of innovation, focusing on delivering a product that every business owner will appreciate.

### Key Features

- **Accountant-Ready Tools**: A double-entry accounting system with automated bank reconciliation.
- **Customizable Reports**: Tailor financial summaries to fit your unique needs.
- **Seamless Migration**: Transition from existing accounting software like QuickBooks easily.
- **User-Friendly Interface**: Designed to be useful whether you have an accountant or you’re managing finances solo.

### Why Choose Modernbanc?

In a sea of accounting software options, Modernbanc distinguishes itself with its commitment to user experience. It’s not just about figuring out numbers; instead, it’s about making the numbers work for you. Whether you’re a small business or an entrepreneur just starting, Modernbanc offers tools that add real value.

For more details, check out their website at [modernbanc.com](https://modernbanc.com). Dive in now to start navigating your business finances with newfound ease. 🏦✨

**Tagline**: Accounting software that works for you—join the financial tech revolution today!
